title: Patent Patrol: SRAM eTap concept removes shift paddles, changes gears with brake levers
content:
The possibilities that electronic shifting opens up are nearly limitless. As long as a button can be pressed somewhere, a signal can be sent and the derailleurs will move to shift the bike.
